title: 'Cubs of the Caliphate': Rehabilitating I.S. child fighters
text:
'Cubs of the Caliphate': Rehabilitating I.S. child fighters 10:29am EST - 01:46 
Naif Jardo Qassim says he wasn't emotionally prepared to listen to the stories of boys and girls as their only therapist at a center for former children conscripted by Islamic State.   
Naif Jardo Qassim says he wasn't emotionally prepared to listen to the stories of boys and girls as their only therapist at a center for former children conscripted by Islamic State.  //reut.rs/2p11GM7
